featured.text: The discovery did not surprise me___(40)__ more than the original request that I should take them off.
To no one’s surprise, it has enjoyed similar popularity.
Surprised by the father and son’s “pale faces” and their battered vessel, the Penghu police and fishers in Paisha rescued them.
My grandmother likes to surprise people.
Nothing does surprise one in a dream.

definition.en_def: An unexpected event or occurrence that causes astonishment or amazement.
definition.example: The surprise party left her speechless.
